entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLI Feature: Design Pattern Templates for .NET Projects #40769

PullRequests

Created

  • Download MSFT Sdk from Latest Installer Build #40779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix ignored paths used by binary tool #40777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't force base image manifests to have a mediaType #40776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #40772
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #40753
    source-build, Area-VMR

Merged

  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #40745
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Rebootstrap source-build/unified-build #40773
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Cleanup snap artifacts #40744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define run tests timeout for UB/SB CI #40749
    Area-VMR
  • Disable SpotBugs in VMR CI builds #40759
    Area-VMR
  • Remove unused files #40750
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix template ordering #40757
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/installer.proj #40742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2447340 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
